document.discussion_title: Ex-pupils invited to Grange School reunion
document.topic_text: Have you got a local story, picture or video you would like to send to us? Send it to us now for a chance to get published. Services Class of 1983 from The Grange School, Stourbridge, invited to reunion Ex-pupils invited to Grange School reunion 0 comments FORMER 80s classmates at The Grange School in Stourbridge are invited to a reunion this autumn. School-leavers from the class of 1983 can get together the Labour in Vain, Redhill, Stourbridge, on Saturday October 1, from 6.30pm onwards. Anyone interested in attending can contact Adrian Pardoe on 07815 620423 or via Facebook.
